extendedInfo.description: Teclado en espaÃ±olSpanish(Espaniol) Language Pack addon for the SlideIT Keyboard v5.0 and up.After installing, go to SlideIT settings and set it as one of your SlideIT languages.This is only an addon. In order to use this language pack, you must install the SlideIT keyboard.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Fab
reviews.author: Oceanauk Uk

reviews.comment: Dictionary is crappy. You\'ll end up adding words to the dictionary because the creator is lazy (No updates).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t get confused: you can type whatever
reviews.comment: I am a spanish native speaker, and this language pack really works. Whenever I slide a word that is new to the app, I just press the + sign and it will learn it for good. Spanish has at least twice the words than English, so I found pretty amazing the accuracy and performance of this particular pack. The best feature is the possibility to create your own shortcuts (codes) for longer words or sentences. IDK: I don\'t know, BRB: Be right back, etc. I just love it. It saves so much time!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really good app
reviews.comment: I really like how it\'s easy to use and the easy change from one language to another. Just what I needed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No BUENO, NOT GOOD.
reviews.comment: I\'m constantly adding simple words to it, NO BUENO. Uninstalling

reviews.title: Let me install install it on my new phone, dammit!
reviews.comment: I bought and used it under a phone under one carrier, but when I bought a new phone from the same  carrier the Market (Google Play, who thought of that?) or the developer does not allow me to install it on the new phone. It is a pitty because the app has improved.
